text.headline: U.S Department of Justice
text.text: As head of the executive branch, President Trump oversees the Justice Department and the United States' relations with the rest of the world. Through his businesses he still has a lengthy series of financial relationships with private institutions and countries with business before the United States.

text.headline: Trump’s unusual conflict: Millions in debts to German bank now facing federal fines
text.text: Washington Post / Trump’s unusual conflict: Millions in debts to German bank now facing federal fines
